gw.cc.financials.check.entity

Interface Deduction


  • public interface Deduction
    Deduction A deduction from a Check.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CurrencyAmount getAmount()
      defers to #getReservingAmount; in multicurrency mode, that method should be preferred
      Currency getCheckCurrency()
      Gets this deduction's check's currency.
      Currency getClaimCurrency()
      Gets this deduction's claim's currency.
      Currency getReservingCurrency()
      Gets this deduction's check's reserving currency.
      CurrencyAmountPair getTransactionCurrencyAmountComponent()
      Gets the TransactionAmount paired with the ReservingAmount.
      void setAmount(CurrencyAmount amount)
      defers to {@link #setReservingAmount(gw.api.financials.CurrencyAmount) in multicurrency mode, that method should be preferred

    • Method Detail

      • getTransactionCurrencyAmountComponent

        CurrencyAmountPair getTransactionCurrencyAmountComponent()
        Gets the TransactionAmount paired with the ReservingAmount.

      • getAmount

        CurrencyAmount getAmount()
        defers to #getReservingAmount; in multicurrency mode, that method should be preferred

      • setAmount

        void setAmount(CurrencyAmount amount)
        defers to {@link #setReservingAmount(gw.api.financials.CurrencyAmount) in multicurrency mode, that method should be preferred

      • getClaimCurrency

        Currency getClaimCurrency()
        Gets this deduction's claim's currency. Required by the currencyamount datatype to resolve the claim currency.

      • getCheckCurrency

        Currency getCheckCurrency()
        Gets this deduction's check's currency. Required by the currencyamount datatype to resolve the check currency. Care must be taken when calling this. Attempts to call this method before wiring the deduction to a check will result in an exception being thrown.

      • getReservingCurrency

        Currency getReservingCurrency()
        Gets this deduction's check's reserving currency. Required by the currencyamount datatype to resolve the reserving currency. Care must be taken when calling this. Attempts to call this method before wiring the deduction to a check and the check to a payment will result in an exception being thrown.
